cracker.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a hard dry type of bread in small flat shapes, that is often eaten with cheese
cracker.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a decorated paper tube that makes a small exploding sound when you pull it apart. Crackers contain a small gift, a paper hat, and a joke, and are used at Christmas in Britain.
cracker.translation[0].definitions[3].de: something that is very good or funny
cracker.translation[0].definitions[3].ex: That was a cracker of a goal.
cracker.translation[0].definitions[4].de: someone who illegally breaks into a computer system in order to steal information or stop the system from working properly
